componentType.description: A required value to indicate the component type. For number line, this must be 'corespring-number-line'.

correctResponse.description: Describes the correct response of points, rays, lines to be displayed on the number line.

domainPosition.description: The value on the number line which represents the correct answer.

config.description: An object describing the various configuration properties of the component.

domain.description: A two-number array representing the minimum and maximum values to be displayed on the number line.

initialType.description: The initial type of point, line, or ray to be set by the component.

showMinorTicks.description: If true, show minor tick labels in the component.

exhibitOnly.description: If true, the interacting with the component is disabled.

maxNumberOfPoints.description: The number of points which may be added to the component by the user.

availableTypes.description: An object mapping point, ray, and line types to boolean values which specify whether or not the types are available for use in the component.

ticks.description: Describes the ticks that are to be displayed along the number line.

label.description: The label to be displayed above the tick.

value.description: The value of the tick on the number line.
